title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Enterprise, Tourism and Employment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Enterprise, Tourism and Employment 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited enterprise tourism employment (delegation ministerial functions) order 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Enterprise, Tourism and Employment conferred on him – 

(a) 

by or under the enactments specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 

(b) by or under the provisions of the enactments specified in Part 2 

of the Schedule, and 

(c) 

under the Regulations specified in Part 3 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Alan Dillon, Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, 
Tourism and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [240] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister enterprise tourism employment conferred - (a) enactment specified part 1 schedule (b) provision enactment specified part 2 schedule (c) regulation specified part 3 schedule delegated alan dillon minister state department enterprise tourism employment notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 6th june 2025 240 3

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: Carriage of Dangerous Goods by Road Act 1998 (No. 43 of 1998)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

PART 1 

Carriage of Dangerous Goods by Road Act 1998 (No. 43 of 1998)

Redundancy Payments Act 1971 (No. 20 of 1971) 

Redundancy Payments Act 1979 (No. 7 of 1979) 

Safety, Health and Welfare (Offshore Installations) Act 1987 (No. 18 of 1987) 

 
 4 [240] 

Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 (No. 10 of 2005) 

Safety in Industry Act 1980 (No. 9 of 1980)

Terms of Employment (Information) Act 1994 (No. 5 of 1994)

1996) 

Unfair Dismissals Act 1977 (No. 10 of 1977) 

Worker Participation (State Enterprises) Act 1977 (No. 6 of 1977) 

Worker Participation (State Enterprises) Act 1988 (No. 13 of 1988) 

Workplace Relations Act 2015 (No. 16 of 2015) 

PART 2 

Part 3 of the Employment (Collective Redundancies and Miscellaneous 
Provisions) and Companies (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 14 of 2024) 

Parts 3 and 4 of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 
(No. 8 of 2023) 

 
 
 
 
 
 [240] 5 

PART 3 

European Communities (Carriage of Dangerous Goods by Road and Use of 
Transportable Pressure Equipment) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 349 of 2011) 

European Communities (Machinery) Regulations 2008 (S.I. No. 407 of 2008) 

European Union (Equipment and Protective Systems Intended for Use in 
Potentially Explosive Atmospheres) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 230 of 2017) 

European Union (Lifts and Safety Components for Lifts) Regulations 2017 (S.I. 
No. 232 of 2017) 

European Union (Non-Automatic Weighing Instruments) Regulations 2018 (S.I. 
No. 47 of 2018)

136 of 2018) 

European Union (Pressure Equipment) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 233 of 2017) 

Legal Metrology (European Conformity Assessment of Measuring Instruments) 
Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 2 of 2018) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
